item.title: Running 16 bit apps in Windows 7 64 bit
item.description: We got for my wife a much needed upgrade for her aging Toshiba laptop. The new one came with Windows 7Â 64 bit. I managed to get all her old software working with the exception of Oxford Superlex. This one is a dictionary from the Windows 3.11 ages. It worked fine in all windowses we had (98, 2000, XP) but having a 64 bit Windows killed it because the support for 16 bits apps is dropped in 64 bits versions of Vista and 7.
